description: Vegan saag paneer made with marinated tofu in a creamy kale (or spinach) curry sauce.
keywords: saag tofu, vegan palak paneer, vegan saag paneer
name: Vegan Saag Paneer (Saag Tofu)
recipeIngredient: 5 oz chopped kale leaves (measured after de-stemming; original weight approximately 10 oz.)
2 green chiles (halved and de-seeded (use 1 to reduce heat)
1/4 cup plain, unsweetened non-dairy milk (I used cashew milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Drain excess liquid from the tofu package, and then press it, either using a tofu press; or by wrapping it in a clean towel and placing a heavy object on top of it for about 10 minutes.

Mix together the rest of the tofu ingredients and season to taste with salt. Cut the tobu into cubes. One at at time, dip the tofu into the yogurt mixture, shake off the excess, and place it on the baking sheet.
Bake for approximately 40 minutes, flipping after the first 30 minutes, until the tofu and coating have firmed up.
